message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's a high-quality item that has been carefully crafted to meet your needs. Considering its exceptional features and benefits, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. For this amazing opportunity, I am offering it to you for $150. I hope we can reach an agreement that satisfies both of us.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the quality of your product, but I'm looking to stay within a budget of $100. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $120? I believe this would still provide a good value while allowing me to respect my financial limits.
